'''Audacity''' is a free [[digital audio editor]] application. Audacity is [[cross-platform]], using the [[wxWidgets]] software [[library (computer science)|library]] to provide a similar [[graphical user interface]] on several different [[operating system]]s. +
'''Audacity''' is a [[Free software|free]] [[digital audio editor]] application. Audacity is [[cross-platform]], using the [[wxWidgets]] software [[library (computer science)|library]] to provide a similar [[graphical user interface]] on several different [[operating system]]s. It is currently used in the OCR National Level 2 ICT course for the sound creation unit.
Audacity was created by [[Dominic Mazzoni]] while he was a graduate student at [[Carnegie Mellon University]]. Dominic Mazzoni now works at [[Google]], but is still the main developer and maintainer of Audacity, with help from many others around the world.
Audacity was created by [[Dominic Mazzoni]] while he was a graduate student at [[Carnegie Mellon University]]. Dominic Mazzoni now works at [[Google]], but is still the main developer and maintainer of Audacity, with help from many others around the world.
